item.title: My experience with German employment visa process
item.description: I am writing this post to share my experience dealing with German employment visa process. I will be talking about what the process looked like, what documents were needed and so on. Hope it helps someone who is going through the same. Let’s look at the process. Book an visa appointment. Prepare the documents. Submit the documents on the appointment day. Recieve the visa. Booking an visa appointment Booking an appointment is probably the most difficult step in the entire process due to the fact that there are very few appoinments available.
